lifebook_ingest_incident.alarm_description: Overall ingest incident: ALARM if Errors OR Throttles OR 15m Quiet.

lifebook_ingest_errors_5m.alarm_description: Fires if AWS/Lambda:Errors for lifebook-ingest >0 in any 1 of 5 minutes. TreatMissing=notBreaching.

lifebook_ingest_quiet_15m.alarm_description: Fires if AWS/Lambda:Invocations for lifebook-ingest are <1 for 15 consecutive minutes. TreatMissing=breaching. Actions -> lifebook-alerts.

lifebook_ingest_throttles_5m.alarm_description: Fires if AWS/Lambda:Throttles for lifebook-ingest >0 in any 1 of 5 minutes. TreatMissing=notBreaching.
